snippet.title: ETHER VAPOR Remaster Trailer 2012
snippet.description:
Trailer for doujin developer Edelweiss's acclaimed multi-perspective 2.75D arcade shooter! 
Localized by Nyu Media Ltd and published outside of Japan by Capcom and Nyu Media.

Visit http://www.ethervapor for full details & the playable demo!

The original soundtrack  is available at http://edelweissjp.bandcamp.com
